entry.title: Style.css is in css directory and "abc.jpg" is in "mockdata" folder.
entry.content:
I have added following lines to add background image:

.wholepage{ background-image: url('../mockdata/abc.jpg'); }

here my question is- why i need to give double dot?.Though it is working fine.I am surprised why it is not working with single dot?

entry.title: calling google storage rest api in SAP CP Neo Environment
entry.content:
Dear Experts

Kindly help on how to call google cloud storage api using rest call or java servrlet call in SAP Cloud Platform NEO environment ?.

Any pointers to it will be very helpful.

entry.title: Good time to set Background Job based on CPU/Memory/Performance apps
entry.content:
Hello experts,

is there any tips/consideration for me newbie abap to set background job properly in a the right time?

i mean, we have to which tcode/table to set BJ in a time which has low load? so it will not interfere with engine performance.

thanks

entry.title: Error while updating Serverless function on Kyma Instance on trial SAP BTP Account
entry.content:
I have deployed couple of serverless functions, on Kyma spun up on the trial account. All good for few days now, all worked perfectly fine, until now, i have been receiving the following error when I update the serverless function, or want to deploy a new one.

Updating an existing one.

When creating new function.

Any idea / clue as to what is happening ? How to get around this, don't want to loose the work done till now on the environment.

entry.title: use approuter manager component from a standalone approuter
entry.content:
Hi,

From an application created as standalone app router, you want to use the component from another application that was created as app router manager.

How do you make the call to the URL?

<code> "resourceRoots": {
			"com.sap.build.standard.solicitudDeIngreso1": "../e6bc4eff-4f5e-46a7-b954-dac6b30ae887.ingresorrhh.comsapbuildstandardsolicitudDeIngreso1"			 
		},
		"componentUsages": {
			"reuseAnotherComponent": {
				"name": "com.sap.build.standard.solicitudDeIngreso1"
			}
		},

As you can see the code does not load the component.

Greeting,

Diego
